Release Notes


eTuneBook Updates are anounced at eTuneBook on FB.

In case you're connected to the internet, eTuneBook Updates occur automatically (in other words you have no choice).


Release 1.1.1 (09.09.13)

  • Fixed broken Navigation from the Set-View to the Tune-View in Firefox and IE.
  • Angular-UI-Router Version 0.2.0
  • Angular Version 1.0.8. Removed Animation Stuff.
  • Bootstrap Version 3.0.0. This hopefully repairs the broken Navigation on Smartphones.

Release 1.1.0 (31.07.13)

  • Major Rework of Navigation (migrated to ui-router): Tune List, Set List, Tune Editor and Set Editor.
  • Top Navigation simplified to: Book, Sets, Tunes, Info.
  • Edit Book Title, Version and Description (Book Editor).
  • Introduction of fast scrolling List Grids (migrated to ng-grid).
  • New Tune List (ng-grid) supporting fast sorting, filtering and grouping.
  • Set-Editor: Sorting TuneSet Position as Number (sets having more than 10 Tunes are now sorted as they should)
  • Dropped support for offline modus (appcache skipped).
  • Temporarily dropped Midi Support due to problems with the Quicktime-Plugin.
    Midi-Support will be re-introduced as soon as abcjs will support javascript Midi.
  • Major Rework of how videos and external sites ar managed (ng-grid). You can now add more than 3 records.
  • 'Just played the set' puts the current date and time on all tunes in a set.
  • 'Just played the tune' can be clicked in the Set Editor and the Tune Editor.
  • Filter sets for Target, Environment and Name of TuneSet.
  • Delete a set position.
  • Add a new Set for an existing tune.
  • Add a comment specific for a set position.
  • Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann: Version 2013-xx-xx.
  • Development/Deployment: Migrated to WebStorm and Yeoman.

Release 1.0.7 (23.05.13)

  • 23.05.13: Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann: Version 2013-05-13.
  • 23.05.13: Fixed New TuneBook/New Tune, which was broken when no TuneBook was imported before.
  • 23.05.13: Export TuneBook to a File on your hard disk.
  • 23.05.13: Edit TuneSet Infos: Target, Environment and Name of TuneSet.
  • 23.05.13: Fixed broken dropdown when navigation bar was collapsed
  • 23.05.13: Copy a tune to another set

Release 1.0.6 (28.04.2013)

  • 09.05.13: Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann: Version 2013-05-09.
  • 09.05.13: New Tune was broken since 30.04.13. Fixed now.
  • 06.05.13: Dots scale increased
  • 06.05.13: Settings: Removed Show/Hide Info,Edit,Rehearse Buttons
  • 06.05.13: abcjs: 1.6 -> 1.7
  • 02.05.13: Change in Topnavigation: Color and Shading
  • 02.05.13: abcjs: 1.3 -> 1.6
  • 02.05.13: Bootstrap: 2.0.4 -> 2.3.1
  • 02.05.13: Angular: 1.0.4 -> 1.0.6
  • 01.05.13: Playing tunes on a MIDI Instrument (IE not supported)
  • 30.04.13: Sets are now printable
  • 30.04.13: Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann: Version 2013-04-30.
  • 30.04.13: Sorting by last modification date
  • 28.04.13: Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann: Version 2013-04-28.
  • 28.04.13: Single Tunes are now printable

Release 1.0.5 (13.02.2013)

  • 30.03.13: Renamed Boxplayer.abc to 'Irish Tunes - Martin Fleischmann'.abc: Version 2013-03-30.
  • 19.02.13: Boxplayer.abc. Initial Version for all tunes: 2013-02-19.
  • 19.02.13: Tunebook Name, Version and Description is now extracted from the abc-header.
  • 19.02.13: Boxplayer.abc: Tunes are now marked with 'Created' and 'Last Modified' using the History-Field.
  • 19.02.13: Fixed broken Random-Sorting.
  • 13.02.13: First Version of Deep-Linking. Browser Back- and Forward-Button now supported.
  • 13.02.13: Boxplayer.abc V099.

Release 1.0.3 (22.12.2012)

  • 03.02.13: Boxplayer.abc V098
  • 20.01.13: FaceBook LikeBox
  • 09.01.13: Boxplayer.abc V097.
  • 06.01.13: Boxplayer.abc V096.
  • 02.01.13: Boxplayer.abc V095.
  • 29.12.12: Boxplayer.abc V094.
  • 22.12.12: First version of tune transposer

Release 1.0.2 (09.12.2012)

  • 19.12.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V092 to V093.
  • 16.12.12: Twice the same tune title in one set: dots are now rendered.
  • 16.12.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V091 to V092.
  • 09.12.12: Introduced more compact session modus for smaller screens.
  • 09.12.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V09 to V091.

Release 1.0.1 (15.10.2012)

  • 28.11.12: Total tune set count fixed in key-selector.
  • 28.11.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V085 to V09.
  • 21.11.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V08 to V085.
  • 01.11.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V07 to V08.
  • 15.10.12: The following settings are now remembered (stored in local storage): Which buttons to show, filter and sort algorithm, selected page.
  • 15.10.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V05 to V06.
  • 16.10.12: Reduced page size from 10 sets to 5.
  • 17.10.12: Reduced sample dots to 4 bars.
  • 01.11.12: Updated Boxplayer.abc from V06 to V07.

Release 1.0.0 (05.10.2012)

  • Launch of eTuneBook
  • Added AppCache for offline work.
  • Fixed broken fingering-switch and extended it to sample dots.
  • Fixed disappearing of sample dots after editing.
  • Updated Boxplayer.abc from V01 to V05.

Limitations / Issues

  • Navigation on smartphones not optimized yet.
